channel.title: ALot of questions,
channel.description:
1.how do i add a model as terrain? if not, then just add a terrain model as an npc?
2.how do i add skill cape emotes to a 317?
3.i kinda want a command that drops a certain item everyone on the server, (idk like ::dropeverywhere 6545) i'd really apreciate this,
4.how do i add another rank, so far there is :0player:1mod:2admin/owner, i want another one for donater or something..
5.how do i make it so that when i click on one item, and then on another, another item apears (and the one clicked disapear) , and i get exp in a certain skill?
6. ok, i'm not good with ints, but how do i make the stats for a custom? for example : str+123 magic+44 prayer +83 :str+100 def+100 str+100 range+ 100..?
7. how do i add an already existing spec to one of my customs?
if you yourself cannot answer these questions, then links to thread which help would be very apreciated.
EDIT: 8.i need help on how to add quests.
9.how do i make an npc talk? and when he does, a selection of teleports?
10. a log-in welcome message, i'm talking about a scroll that apears on window with my own welcome message. (which is closed by clicking the top right "X")

item.title: ALot of questions,
item.dc:creator: @WhiteWolves WhiteWolves
item.description:
@WhiteWolves wrote:

because i think it’s obvouis that you gaveme a link that was relavent to the question, u gave me something that i can use,

but amerika was just trying to be funny (or is just plain stupid) and he gave me the most popular search engine which is pointless because like i said earlier this is what these forums were made for -,-
W/E
ty Oh-Noes for answering soem of my questions,
but i still have alot of unanswered ones, i would apreciate it if you stopped talking about anything that hasnt anything to do wit my questions

Read full topic

item.title: ALot of questions,
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“The Soul, post:8, topic:317182”][quote author=WhiteWolves link=topic=413725.msg3046715#msg3046715 date=1259792567]
hmm,
i’m asking for links to threads with-n these forums which might help if you do not know the answer yourself,
do not post pointless crap like “google knows the way”
if you don’t know the answer then don’t bother posting in the help section,
you’ve only tooken upmy time.
[/quote]

The reason I didn’t blatantly spoonfeed you is because that isn’t how I do things. I try to get the users to go out and find the answer themselves as it helps them realize they can find the answers they’re looking for without relying on someone all the time. It also helps you (referring to all MoparScape users here) become independent in real-life situations.[/quote]Being independent, you’ll find, is the best way to go about private server development. I don’t see how you could be so ignorant as to pass up the The Sou’s suggestion. That search engine filters your questions to specific sites to help you with RSPS development. Everyone that succeeds at moparscape has either done everything on their own or limited their questions to only a few by solving them on their own via trial and error.

Read full topic

item.title: ALot of questions,
item.dc:creator: @Oh-Noes Oh-Noes
item.description:
@Oh-Noes wrote:

  1. Not 100% sure what you mean, but to edit what the map/land looks like you’d have to change the mapdata - there are tools for this. You can add models as an NPC in class5, and as an object in class46 (all client-sided).

  2. Just add an animation and gfx to an emote button. If you want the real animations/gfx from runescape, you’d have to add them client-sided (has been done and released, check google).

  3. Just search around for a drop party command - I’m sure loads of servers have done it.

  4. playerRights is just another integer - you can make it anything you want through the character files, or make a command for it(I think). You can use something like 5 for anything you want; just add appropriate limits to the things you want them to have access to (commands, objects, etc.). Also, you’d probably have to add some client sided stuff for new crowns to match the new rights.

  5. Item on item method - most servers (if not all) will have it. Try searching for case 53 in your client.java.

  6. Item.cfg.

  7. What source are you using?

Read full topic
